comments.body: Thanks for the PR!  Can you please add the documentation for these properties from their API documentation? https://community.algolia.com/react-instantsearch/connectors/connectInfiniteHits.html

I did that first, but it caused a conflict in the `this` and then returned only `React.Component<TExposed> & ConnectedWidget`, and couldn't infer the returned props anymore. Maybe another time :)
